init.title: Sense Energy Monitor - Configuration
init.description: Configure data refresh rate and AI-powered energy insights

data_description.realtime_update_rate: How often to update power readings. Faster rates (5-10s) are more responsive but use more API calls.
data_description.electricity_rate: Cost you pay per kilowatt-hour (kWh) of electricity. Check your utility bill for your rate.
data_description.solar_credit_rate: Credit you receive per kWh of solar energy sent back to the grid. Leave at 0 if you don't have solar.
data_description.currency: Currency symbol to display for cost calculations.
data_description.ai_provider: Enable AI-powered insights, forecasting, and recommendations for your energy usage.
data_description.ai_agent_id: Select which conversation agent to use for AI features. Auto-detect works for most setups.
data_description.ai_token_budget: Control AI token usage. Low uses fewer tokens, High provides more frequent insights. Based on your existing API plan.
